title: Figure, "Telephone Talk", 1954
markings: underside: Dulevo mark with "58" stamped in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Underneath a T-shaped canopy with MT logo on top, a young man and woman talk on two telephones; man wearing overcoat, red tie, hat; woman wearing rose colored coat, carries white bag; rectangular base with gilded decoration .

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Telephone Talk", 1954.
1954. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-222.
